info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 8:39PM CDT until May 3 at 11:09PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas...
Rabbit Creek At Kilgore affecting Gregg County.
For the Rabbit Creek...including Kilgore...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Rabbit Creek at Kilgore.
* WHEN...Until Saturday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Expect flooded trails and a private boat launch.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 12.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 845 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING
